author: iahmad-khan
body:
The following is a mix of Cloudfare + Brian + orignal zlib. Some
internal functions are implemented with SSE4.2, PCLMUL and AVX2.
Thos are picked at load time. This still builds on "generic" machine.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: zlib: experimental changes (SSE4.2, PCLMUL, AVX2)
